snippet.title: Tropico for iPad - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description: Excellent news, Compañeros! Feral Interactive today announced that Tropico, the strategic city builder and humorous dictator sim, will be released on iPad later this year. Based on the acclaimed series originally published by Kalypso Media, Tropico for iOS has been redesigned and developed for mobile by Feral, and will arrive on iPad as a premium game with no in-app purchases.
